mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mrk (id, writer, lat, lng, img, rating, detail, keyword, title, rdate) VALUES ( mrk_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{lat}, #{lng} , #{img}, #{rating}, #{detail}, #{keyword}, #{title}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy.MM.dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mrk ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT m.*, COUNT(c.id) AS comment_count FROM mrk m LEFT JOIN mrk_comm c ON m.id = c.post_id GROUP BY m.id, m.writer, m.lat, m.lng, m.img, m.rating, m.detail, m.keyword, m.title, m.rdate ORDER BY comment_count DESC
